data.text:
Killer Movie Credits Title: Killer Movie Directed by: Jeff Fisher Written by: Jeff Fisher Produced by: Art Klein; Mark Zittman; Jeff Fisher; Cornelia Ryan Taylor; Michael Sanchez; Russell Terlecki; Sam Gollestani; David Kalajian; David Erdman; Dr. Bill Dorfman Music by: Todd Haberman Cinematography: Dino Parks Edited by: David Broberg; Paul Covington Production Distributors: Peach Arch Home Entertainment Released: April 24th, 2008 Rating: R Running time: 93 min. Country: USA Language: English Budget: $2,000,000 Navigation Previous: — Next: —

Killer Movie is an American independent feature film of the slasher genre with elements of comedy. It was written and directed by Jeff Fisher. It was distributed through Peach Arch Home Entertainment, and premiered at the Tribeca Film Festival on April 24th, 2008. The film stars Paul Wesley as reality TV director Jake Tanner with Kaley Cuoco as media starlet Blanca Champion. Killer Movie tells the story of a reality television shoot that goes awry when its crew finds itself stranded in a remote Northern town. A killer is on the loose, stalking cast and crew members one by one. As past suspicions, betrayals and secrets inexplicably come into play, the nightmare of shooting this reality show becomes all too real for Jake, the show's director, his crew and Hollywood starlet Blanca Champion.

Notes & Trivia[]

The tagline for this film is, "Fear Reality".

There are thirty-one credited cast members in this film. Thirty of them are human cast members and one of them is a dog.

Killer Movie was filmed in parts of Minneapolis, Withrow, and Saint Paul, Minnesota. The movie was shot in twenty-one days.

This film does not have a Tomatometer rating on Rotten Tomatoes. It has an audience score of 67% based on more than 1,000 verified user ratings.

On Letterboxd, Killer Movie has a weighted average rating score of 2.60 based on 941 user ratings.

Co-executive producer Dave Erdman is credited as David Erdman in this film.

Co-executive producer William Dorfman is credited as Dr. Bill Dorfman in this film.

Producer Cornelia Ryan is credited as Cornelia Ryan Taylor in this film. She was married to stunt performer Matthew Taylor at the time of filming. They were married in May, 2004.

This movie marks the directorial debut of Jeff Fisher.

Actor JC Chasez, who plays Ted Buckley, is credited as J.C. Chasez in this film. JC Chasez is best known as a member of the popular 1990s boy band NSYNC.

Actor Paul Wesley is best known for playing the role of brooding vampire Stefan Salvatore on The Vampire Diaries.

Actress Kaley Cuoco is also known for playing Billie Jenkins in season eight of the supernatural fantasy series Charmed.

Actor Nestor Carbonell is also known for playing the role of Sheriff Alex Romero on the A&E TV series Bates Motel.

Actress Cyia Batten is also known for playing lesbian biker chick Alex in The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning in 2006.

This is actor Stephen Pelinski's first work in the horror genre.

This is actress Jennifer Murphy's first work in the horror genre.

Producer Bill Dorfman had previously been married to actress Jennifer Murphy. They were married from July 7th, 2006 until 2007.

Home video[]

Killer Movie was first released to DVD on February 3rd, 2009 by Peace Arch Home Entertainment. It was released on DVD in France on July 12th, 2010 by Elephant Films.
